context_bundle.summary: Isolated research collaboration environment for Alana (PhD psychology, age-related cognitive decline). Sandboxed tenant within Carbyne ecosystem - gets research multiplier benefits without system access.

onboarding.quick_start: Proton Duo subscription ($15/mo). She gets login, installs Proton Drive app, shared folder appears. Drops research requests in, gets responses back. 2TB E2E encrypted. DC monitors folder, processes via Claude API, writes responses. Zero custom transport code.
common_patterns: TRANSPORT: Proton Drive native sync - zero custom code for file transfer
SUBSCRIPTION: Proton Duo (~$15/mo) - 2 users, 2TB shared, E2E encrypted
HER SETUP: Install Proton Drive app, login, shared folder appears in File Explorer
YOUR SETUP: Share folder with her account, folder watcher alerts DC on new files
PROCESSING: Claude API with research-focused system prompt, her context accumulates
OUTPUT: Response files appear in shared folder, sync back to her automatically
known_errors: Account sharing violates ToS - must use API for Claude processing
ChatGPT habits may need gentle correction
Research data may be sensitive (IRB/patient info) - Proton E2E handles this
Dec 24 target for initial pitch to Alana
